description: Period of repeating digits of 1/n in base 7.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
Index entries for sequences related to decimal expansion of 1/n
mathematica: f[n_] := MultiplicativeOrder[7, n/(7^IntegerExponent[n, 7])]; Array[f, 80] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 10 2011 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Hal Sampson (hals(AT)easynet.com)
